name: Arobynn: Below The Surface
description:
Finally, the multiplayer VR dungeon crawler we've all been waiting for! Complete with floor bosses, traps, and a glowing immersive environment. What can I say except you're welcome! Whether you like it or not, share it on social media to help the genre grow.

Game Story
Most of the living word and the surface has been destroyed during the Geocubic wars of the past. A devastating technology that crystalizes structures was weaponized and used heavily during the wars leading to the fall and collapse. For centuries, the surface remained barren and hope for the future was lost, but beneath the desolation life began to return.

Your adventure begins exploring the extent of Geocubic crystallization Below The Surface. Loot for materials, upgrade your weapons and armors, and work your way farther into the depths.

Gameplay
-Light from the surface effects the faces of Geocubic crystal and can be used to navigate. [Clever players may also spot braille lettering]
-Find the weapons and playstyle that works best for you.
-A well timed dash can make all the difference.
